gameTemplate.Game Description: Celeste is a story-driven platformer where a young woman named Madeline climbs the mysterious Celeste Mountain. Along the way, she confronts her inner demons—literal and metaphorical—battling anxiety, self-doubt, and fear. The game combines tight, challenging platforming with a heartfelt narrative that explores mental health and personal growth. Its pixel art, music, and gameplay all work together to deliver an emotional and rewarding experience.

Actions.name: Move
Actions.description:
Moving the joystick horizontally will cause Madaline (The player) to move left and right. Moving the joystick vertically will cause Madaline to jump or crouch
 While dashing this control is also used to determin where to go

Actions.name: Dash
Actions.description:
Pressing will stop time and allow you to dash in any direction. You will have to be holding this button while you select which way to dash
 When you have selected which way you want to go, release this button!

Settings.name: Grab Mode
Settings.description: Inverts the base game's grab. Allows you to auto stick to walls first and then jump off of them

Settings.name: Rebind Jump Action
Settings.description: This allows you to jump with just the joystick. Select Jump from Control Config and press up with your joystick. This will bind it to be used for jumping

Settings.name: Assist Mode
Settings.description:
Assist Mode allows you to make the game easier through certain settings
While on the screen for selecting a file, select a file and below in small text with Continue and Delete, You can turn assist mode on

Settings.name: Dash Assist
Settings.description: Dash Assist allows you to pause the game while dashing and select the direction you want to travel in.

Settings.name: Game Speed
Settings.description: Allows you to slow the game down to perform more actions in a shorter time window

Settings.name: Infinite Stamina
Settings.description: Allows you to hang onto walls forever

Settings.name: Invincibility
Settings.description: Removes the player’s ability to die
